price: Go to Pharaoh and say, ‘We are the messengers[6] from the Lord of the worlds,
arabic: فَأۡتِيَا فِرۡعَوۡنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: [6] The singular form in Arabic denotes that they both were sent with a single message.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
